website_summaries.verdict: Ultra-slimline model (1.6mm) for convenient, compact tracking. Easy-to-use mobile app.
pros: Comes with wireless Bluetooth charger (Qi charge pad)
Card battery lasts up to 3 months on full charge
Twice the range as other models at 300 ft. Ringing emits 80 dB, so it’s definitely loud enough to hear
cons: Some people find it bulky in their wallet, and there have been some issues with the Qi charging pad

customer_reviews.title: This card can find your phone while on silent!
customer_reviews.text: This bluetooth tracking card is awesome! It charges pretty quickly with the wireless charging pad, the setup is fast and app is very easy to use. Because it's a slim card the size of a regular credit card, you can slide it into basically any wallet, purse, bag, or suitcase of any size and feel completely confident while traveling. My favorite feature about this tracking card is that you can actually use it to find your phone if you misplace it... even if it's on silent!! I am totally going to purchase one of these for husband whom works in the oilfield so he travels weekly and tends to misplace his things a lot. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Karen shaw

customer_reviews.title: I'm not losing my wallet anymore!
customer_reviews.text: I have a tiny wallet and I tend to be forgetful. I put the safedome card in there and now anytime I misplace it I can hear the alarm and know where it is. Saves me so much frustration! I also like that I have it set up so that if I leave the house without my wallet I'm notified. Super convenient. I also really like the charge pad it came with. Works great with my phone. I can now easily charge my phone at my desk. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey Reid

customer_reviews.title: Best way to keep track of my suitcase!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my upcoming study abroad trip to France. I will put it in my suitcase that I am checking and then use it in my day bag while I am touring. It was super easy to set up and charged quickly. I love that it comes with a wireless charger that I can use for my phone too! The credit card size card is easy to slip into your bag without being noticed and I believe is a great way to locate my bag is it is stolen! I feel much more secure now that I will be taking this along with me!
customer_reviews.author: mamavazquez

customer_reviews.title: not working as promised
customer_reviews.text: charged for many hours after arrival. Connected to phone, few hour later made a bunch of noises and hasn’t connected since, even 1 ft away. I really wanted something I could set and forget, now all I have is another headache. Contacted help, they said make sure GPS and bluetooth was on, yes. it connected again, 1hr later it was no longer connected, even though within 3'. Returned
customer_reviews.author: DMB

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I've been sick of losing my wallet and purse everywhere and this has already saved me. I forgot my purse somewhere when I was doing errands and It was so easy to go on my phone and track where I had left it. Since I'm so prone to losing things, this has given me peace of mind that I can easily find the things I'm missing! The charging pad is easy to use so once a week I just charge it up overnight and put it back in my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: wavrida

customer_reviews.title: no notifications in the app when leaving it behind
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to make an alarm, notification...something? Tested it by leaving my house without it, drove several miles away, and returned with NO notifications or alarms. If you go into the app while you are out, it will tell you where the object it is. So it is only helpful if you know you are missing the object. That defeats the purpose of having it in, let's say, a wallet when you would want a ding, bell, something alerting you left without it.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great product, has saved me time already - find anything fast!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I frequently misplace things, like my phone, wallet, etc, so this seemed like a good idea... and it IS! Has already helped me find my phone several times. This would be great on a trip with locating luggage. It's slim, easy to use and charge, and the charge lasts a really long time. The app is easy to use, as well. I am going to be getting one for my husband for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia S.

customer_reviews.title: A great idea, but not loud enough to be effective
customer_reviews.text: I like this little device, I really do. And if your wallet or passport case is nearby and not underneath or inside anything else, you'll find it relatively easy. But in my experience, the speaker on this card isn't loud enough to locate if it's not sitting out in the open or relatively unimpeded. Maybe I'm getting old and my hearing is starting to go, but I don't have this same issue with the Tile Slim, which is also less expensive. The Qi charging is a great idea, though.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool invention! You can use this card to track down your wallet or your bag. Especially useful when traveling. It was easy to set up and pair with my device. Not only can you use this card to find your items but on the card there's even a button to track your phone! I was also happy to find out that you can also use the charging pad with your phone and not just the card. Overall, I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Cristen A

customer_reviews.title: Handy Device and Bonus Charger.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to help track my purse if it is stolen. Or to remind me if I forgot where I put it down. The app is easy to set up. The card is exactly the size of a credit card and would not even be noticed if someone did steal my purse. A BIG plus is that the charger is compatible with my iPhone so I have an extra portable charger for a different area of my house. The battery is supposed to last quite a while and as for durability, time will tell. But even if the card did break that charger is great.
customer_reviews.author: joan

customer_reviews.title: Good product but could use some improvements.
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, the sound is too quite as it’s impossible to here it when I try to bing it from my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory T Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Cool Product, Excellent Appearance
customer_reviews.text: The card and charger are designed super slick; look and feel is great. Place the card on the charger and the lights change color in a fluid, pleasing way. My only criticism would be the beep tone the card emits. I understand they wanted to keep the speaker device in the card as small as possible, but the volume is on the low side. Aside from this, it's a very cool product, and I can see giving them as gifts, since everyone misplaces their wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Feeney

customer_reviews.title: To quiet and unreliable- get Pebblebee instead.
customer_reviews.text: This card is ridiculously low volume - it sounds like an old Casio watch. How can you find anything when you can’t hear it even if you are next to it. This is a ridiculous design. Pebblebee is so much more reliable even without having your location constantly on. I like it’s wireless charger and wireless charging but that’s about it so I kept it just for that I will not buy any other unit if this one is so bad and unreliable.
customer_reviews.author: JRM

customer_reviews.title: Hit or Miss
customer_reviews.text: This thing is okay. Its a Hit or miss with me I would press my phone so that the card can make the noise since I lost my wallet in the car and it would take forever to connect to it and then make noise so by the time it connected to the card I already found my wallet. So I mean its not always like that but most of the time it is. And yess my Bluetooth is always on because my watch is always connected to my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my purse and bonus with the qi charger for my phone
customer_reviews.text: This tracker works perfectly for my need of locating my purse and locating my phone. The credit card size fits neatly in a pocket of my purse. It charges very quickly. I really like that it has a qi charger that will also charge my Samsung phone. I was able to select the tone so I can hear it. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma

customer_reviews.title: Love the wireless charging pad!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for an upcoming trip, where I want to have the security of knowing where my stuff is in case it ends up missing (traveling out of the country). It charges quickly, it easily fits inside my wallet, and the app was simple to use. Even comes with a wireless charging pad that charges both the card and my phone! Nice bonus!
customer_reviews.author: J.A.

customer_reviews.title: Where’s  this been all my life.
customer_reviews.text: I am notorious for leaving my wallet in different rooms in my house. Living in a 2 story townhome I can spend tons of time trying to track down where I left my wallet when I came home the day before. This device makes it easy and simple to find out where my wallet is the next day. It has saved me time and effort already and I’d suggest it for any others that regularly leave things around in their house or place of work and can’t find them later in
customer_reviews.author: JonG

customer_reviews.title: Alert noise to find wallet unreliable and doesn't work most of the time
customer_reviews.text: Worked well at fist then I misplaced wallet twice at house. Card wouldn't make any noise when I needed to find using app which is why I purchased. Had to resort to searching like normal which resulted in running behind schedule. Really a waste of money and junk. Only positive thing is that it showed that it was at my house otherwise it's worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in great packaging and is a handy charger that is also compatible with some phones. The thin card can fit in a credit card holder or a wallet fine. It’s about twice the thickness of a credit card. A great tool for keeping track of things.
customer_reviews.author: Mayjar

customer_reviews.title: Not a great wallet tracker
customer_reviews.text: I got this product and realized there is 2 major problems with it. 1. The sound the card makes when you are close to your wallet and ping it is so low you can’t even hear it inside your wallet at all making it pointless. 2. The tracking app doesn’t update instantly. My wallet was in my house and I couldn’t find it so i looked at the app and it said it was buy a store I went to the other day when it was actually in my home. The charger is great works fine and I love that it can be recharged but it’s not very useful because it doesn’t track well and isn’t easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Buck

customer_reviews.title: Handy little thing... except
customer_reviews.text: This lil guy can be a lifesaver. Ping and your wallet is found. I can’t seem to get it to ring my phone though, like the card says it can. But hey, I don’t think there’s been a time where I lose my phone. Anyway, I like this like thing. It’s a great idea. And the battery lasting 3 months is a huge plus. Haven’t gotten to that point yet. But we will see. The wireless charger is a plus too! When I get a new phone (hopefully soon) maybe I’ll be able to use that.
customer_reviews.author: Chrislabar22

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing. Only works sometimes. Not dependable!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my other more popular brand did not work. This does not work very well either. The sound is too low. It literally only works some of the time. I sometimes my phone does not activate at all. Really disappointing since it is my second try and I really need something like this to help find my wallet. Unfortunately this is not the product to solve my problem.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M.

customer_reviews.title: Best one I’ve seen so far
customer_reviews.text: Thinner than a tile card tracker and a more user friendly app for a couple dollars less. The battery life is great it’s as thin as metal credit card but not as thin as an I.D all and all it’s sold the only problem is the app takes 20mins to update.
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: The security of knowing my husband can find his wallet anytime is wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: I liked that this card fits in a wallet just like any other credit card; once it's in there, you don't even notice. it's been 3 months and only had to charge it once. The keyfobs, on the other hand have been a nightmare!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: No more lost phone for me!
customer_reviews.text: I lose my phone throughout the house all day long! Everyday! #Momlife. This little gadget makes it so now I don't have to bother a family member to call my phone multiple times a day so I can locate it as well as save me having to admit that yes I misplaced my phone AGAIN. Just a push of one button. I see it's mostly for locating a purse or wallet but I find the fact that it can operate in a phone locator manner also is great for my needs!
customer_reviews.author: teresa p

customer_reviews.title: Delayed and disconnects constantly
customer_reviews.text: About once a week it will say disconnected wile it’s in my pocket and show last connected location miles away (in a direction I wasn’t coming from) Doesn’t inform me when I’ve actually left my wallet behind tho
customer_reviews.author: Mohawk Photography

customer_reviews.title: Its the size of a credit card and easy to carry
customer_reviews.text: this product is pretty frikken amazing, i have it linked up to my phone and if i get about 5 ft from my purse or laptop case, i get an alert on my phone
customer_reviews.author: JmackOregon

customer_reviews.title: Durable and compact
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He says it's a 5 so far. He likes the promise of a 3 month charge (we'll see how that goes). It seems durable, and he likes that it beeps and can be used to find his phone, which is a neat feature I somehow missed when I ordered it. It is as small as stated, fitting well into the outside pocket of his RFID-blocking wallet, a pocket intended to hold a driver's license.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Guerra

customer_reviews.title: Useless.  Shows out of range in my other pocket.
customer_reviews.text: This goes off as out of range when in the other pocket from my phone. Utterly useless!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Matthew Portwood

customer_reviews.title: Bad volume
customer_reviews.text: Always lost connection with my phone after it connect we can't hear it, the volume of this the is too light no one could hear it...
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome locater!
customer_reviews.text: I’m the worse at losing my wallet so I was encouraged to see this available! I absolutely love that it is easy to use and can track my wallet on my phone. Now my kids and husband don’t have to spend hours helping me. Ha! It charges quickly. The card is the size of a standard credit card so it is slim and fits in your wallet with ease. Great product for those who are forgetful like me 😉
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Whitton

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Super good product love that it’s rechargeable only wish for iPhone the app didn’t always HAVE to be open !
customer_reviews.author: Alexxa

customer_reviews.title: Junk do not but.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. Second one. It's a piece of crap. Don't waste your money on it
customer_reviews.author: Louis M Bizzari

customer_reviews.title: Poor support from amazon
customer_reviews.text: The charge blue light on the card doesn’t work and the range of detection is very poor, I’ve tried to return the product to amazon, but they said i have to pay the international shipping, and it is 50 usd, more than the item cost, im very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Kauil

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and great customer support!
customer_reviews.text: The card tracker is very straight forward and easy to use. It works exactly as it says and even when I assumed there may have been a problem with it charging Safedome sent me an entire new unit for free and a discount code, no questions asked! Great customer support!
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Ciampaglia

customer_reviews.title: App and connectivity issues.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work well. App was a little buggy. Kept on not connecting. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Pheng Vue

customer_reviews.title: not durable enough for a wallet to sit on
customer_reviews.text: i like the idea but it not good for a wallet after a month it will stop working guess sitting on your wallet was not part of there plan. looking for something else any ideas
customer_reviews.author: Charlie H.

customer_reviews.title: Charging & pairing card is horrible
customer_reviews.text: I am now for the second time returning this item. The charger works fine but the card doesn’t charge and so does NOT pair. I have two of these one card works fine, but TWICE now I’ve gotten a defective card! Frustrating ! VERY FRUSTRATING!
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Lefevre

customer_reviews.title: Pretty thin
customer_reviews.text: Battery dies faster than the few months. I missed Any notification to charge like it says. But overall ok
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Maestas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing invention
customer_reviews.text: Amazing invention. Loved it and gave a gift as well. Very convenient to use and has an amazing better life
customer_reviews.author: Zee

customer_reviews.title: Best Wireless Rechargeable Wallet Tracker Available
customer_reviews.text: What I really love about this product is that you don’t have a bunch of proprietary wires, the battery life is incredible! It’s stylish and very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Richard F.

customer_reviews.title: Won’t sync
customer_reviews.text: Ordered once, couldn’t get card to sync, ordered replacement, same thing, pressed button card to sync, nothing happened, returned second card. Will have to keep searching
customer_reviews.author: mobrien

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This device has helped me multiple times since I’ve received it! The size/design is super convenient and I’m eager to try out more safe dome products in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Daiyaan Wali-Mahmood

customer_reviews.title: The most important thing is Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: I like how the Safedome has a charging base to charge it. I am using it to track my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: DAN78

customer_reviews.title: Sound level
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend.. He tried it out and the sound is very low. He got a wireless charger out of it, but the wallet finder is of no use for him 😥
customer_reviews.author: TMH

customer_reviews.title: Phone app doesnt work. unusable.
customer_reviews.text: App on my Note 10 stopped working over a month ago. currently unusable.
customer_reviews.author: DNG

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Product worked for a few days then stopped working. Do not buy. I took the risk and regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Lavergne

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up Easy to use Would like more to give as gifts for family members
customer_reviews.author: Norma Madain

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: What a life safer! Ultra compact and easy to operate
customer_reviews.author: cait

customer_reviews.title: Good t know
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased to know I won'lose my billfold Again!!
customer_reviews.author: Mern brewer

customer_reviews.title: A must have item
customer_reviews.text: Got a couple for my wife and myself. Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Mustafa

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Product is really good charges card pretty fast Nd u can use It for ur wallet or fone and also charge ur iPhone
customer_reviews.author: Rudy V

product_meta.title: Safedome | Ultra Slim Rechargeable Bluetooth Tracker, Locator Finder Card - With a Lifespan of Over 8 Years, You’ll Never Lose Your Wallet, Purse, Phone, or Anything - Ever Again. - 1 Card / 1 Charger
product_meta.description: Safedome Bluetooth Recharge Tracking Card makes looking after what's valuable easy. Whether you’ve left your wallet at home, lost your phone down the back of the couch or misplaced your bag on a busy shopping day. It’s your own personal backup before losing something turns into a real problem.The slim tracking card is made with the highest quality components combined with great design, it’s the world’s first Bluetooth tracker that can be wirelessly charged. The Qi wireless charging pad can also be used with compatible phones and watches. Tracking Bluetooth tech at its best to help you find your valuables.
feature_bullets: LONGEST LIFESPAN ON THE MARKET: Lasting over 8+ Years, the Safedome Recharge will outlast every Tracking Card on the market today - and because we’ve combined our ‘Wireless Qi’ technology and industry-leading battery life, you’ll only need to recharge once every 4 months!

NEARLY CREDIT CARD THIN: At 1.66 mm. the Safedome Recharge is just slightly thicker than a Credit Card & will fit anywhere you can imagine: Wallet, Purse, Backpack, Bag… What will you protect with your Safedome?
GET THE APP! Easily set up your new Recharge Card with the free Top Rated (4+ stars) Safedome App to instantly track anything… anywhere!
FIND YOUR LOST PHONE: Use your phone to find your tracker OR use the tracker to find your Phone! Simply push the blue button & your Phone will ring, even if it's on silent.
FIND ANYTHING, ANYWHERE: Our leading ‘Bluetooth 5’ technology uses a fraction of the energy of the outdated GPS tracking devices. Works up to 300 feet outdoors...that’s nearly a football field away!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars143 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
